metadata.name: A Kid Called Beast: Winter Break
metadata.description:
Experience the magic of winter with "A Kid Called Beast", a stunning Twitter banner NFT that captures the joy and wonder of the season. In this artwork, a beautiful family is enjoying a festive winter picnic, complete with snowball fights, building snowman. The child is seen joyfully throwing a snowball while his mom is making a snowball with an annoyed expression, trying to fend off the incoming snowballs.

The artwork is full of intricate details and vibrant pastel colors, from the snow-covered trees in the background to the patterned winter clothes of the family. This art has expertly captured the warmth and love of a family enjoying a winter day together.

With "A Kid Called Beast" as your Twitter banner, you'll add a touch of winter magic to your profile. Every time you log in, you'll be reminded of the joy of spending time with loved ones and the beauty of the winter season.
